name: Astro Calm
description:
Hello there!

Astro Calm is a mix between a simulation game, and a bullet hell. There is no lifebar - but there are still consequences. You play as a planet, and everytime you get hit, the elements on the surface of your planet changes!

Can you create a planet full of life? By the way - there is a win condition for this game (it doesn't communicate it very well). Get it by having a planet flourishing with life!

My little brother and I worked on this game together. This is the first official gamejam we've ever participated in! We're excited with what we've made, and would love to hear your feedback! If you liked the game, or noticed a bug, or have anything to say in general, feel free to leave a comment down below!

VERSIONS:

v0.3.0: Original upload for Beginner's Circle #3!

v0.3.2:  Minor Bugfixes, & Fixed GUI scaling issues between different machines (hopefully)
